The composed part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks В отличие от обычной композиции, части, состоящие из этого метода, не гарантированно остаются действительными, если каталог`compositionService` изменяется.Unlike ordinary composition, parts composed with this method are not guaranteed to remain valid if the catalog behind`compositionService` changes.

span.span: or is .
An error occurred during composition.
contains a collection of errors that occurred.
The has been disposed.
